column4: Error trying to open /dev/hda exclusively (Permission denied)... retrying in 1 second. I get this when do a cdrecord -scanbus dev=ATAPI. Am I missing a module or something?
Drop the 'dev=' bit while you scanbus.
but I have a ide cdrw, and dropping dev bit simply give no results
Okay, so you no longer need to scanbus. then? :)
Look up qemu; it's better than bochs.
Try decreasing the volume level to 77% or less.
Huh, that sucks.  What sound card?
Okay.  Can you pastebin the contents of /proc/partitions ?
Sorry, forgot about you for a sec. (-:
Are you the same one who was here about fifteen minutes ago?
